ForbiddenTypeUsedInProperty("Foo", "$$s", Union([String(Span { line: 5, column: 16, position: 67 }), Integer(Span { line: 5, column: 23, position: 74 }), Callable(Span { line: 5, column: 27, position: 78 })]), Span { line: 5, column: 38, position: 89 }) -> Parse Error: Property Foo::$$s cannot have type `string|int|callable` on line 5 column 38
